person_credits.name: Colin Upton
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, cover, production

description:
After centuries of slavery under the oppressive rule of the Tamiran Empire, the people of Xiltria could no longer bear such anguish. Through immeasurable losses and hardships, these suffering victims were finally able to win back their lands. By forming militias and unifying all slaves together under one flag they were eventually able to crush the Tamiran Empire who had conquered the world so long ago. The people now had a fresh start in life. With their new "free world" they finally have a chance to get what they've wanted from the very start...peace.

Their dreams have been realized. Regions. Countries. Nations have been restored to their former glory. All of Xiltria now works together. With their continued efforts to reshape the world it is a time of prosperity. However, the seeds of evil have endured. In the underbelly of society, subtle remnants of the exiled Tamiran Empire still live on...and are starting to give way towards a new threat.

It's been nearly eight years since the citizens of Xiltria regained their freedom. Sekken, a young man who lived through the carnage, travels the world in an attempt to suppress any threats that could endanger this new "free world."
name: Recurring

description: Rory and Franny go on their first date, but shortly after Rory is ambushed in an alley by the Straight Satans motorcycle gang. After two attacks in as many days, one of them by followers of Charlie Manson, Rory enlists the help of his old friend Mossy, the President of the Mongrels Motorcycle Club. Though this comic series is fiction many of the characters are real, and the story is rooted in historical fact, specifically Charlie Manson's desire to target celebrities for violence and his infamous residence at the Spahn movie ranch. Also, this series takes place during a very specific historical timeline (Saturday, August 2 - Monday, August 11, 1969), and the events are intertwined with the Sharon Tate and LaBianca family murders that took place during those days. It features meticulously research on the Manson murders and the narrative has been developed in a way so that the events in the story could be historically plausible and a resolution is reached without contradicting the historical record.
name: Chapter 3

description: The clock is running out on his life after Commissioner Gordon ingests a deadly dose of Joker toxin! But what happens when Batman finds one of his most dangerous enemies guarding the antidote? Meanwhile, Penguin gets a surprise visitorâ€¦
name: The Last Will and Testament of the Joker Part 3 of 3

story_arc_credits.name: The Last Will and Testament of the Joker
The Last Will and Testment of the Joker

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: The Last Will and Testment of the Joker
The Last Will and Testament of the Joker

description: The Monster of Gore Bay concludes. Confronted by the real sea monster, the Spence Gang sends the beast into a rampaging fury. If it destroys its own undersea cavern, it will bury not just the gangsters, but Batman and Robin too.

There's shock news for the menace Squad in theis week's Beano, because the battle for Beanotown is about to begin! Walter's Dad is Menace enemy number one and plans to have the kids under control! Eek!

What else is happening in Beanotown this week?

  • Make Simon Cowell look silly!
  • Squeeze your own prank tomato splats!
  • Win an iPad Mini!

PLUS all your comic strip faves!

Walter's Dad wants to stop Dennis's fun by becoming Mayor of Beanotown! There's nothing he won't stop at - even framing Dennis and Gnasher! Eek!

What else is new in Beanotonw this week?

  • Make a ping pong bazooka!
  • Prank your parents!
  • Laugh at Ball Boy's top ten footie jokes!

PLUS... 22 LOL comic strips AND win an iPad Air 2!

More Coffee for the Pope

After an argument with his parents... Bob meets the Pope at Ed's Cafe and the Pope gives Bob a little bit of life advice. Later on, The government agents show up at Bob's apartment. They want to know about his 'super hero' activities and the IRS wants to audit him.
name: More Coffee For the Pope

description: Horror City issue #3 includes 3x spine-chilling stories. We start with "ZOMBIE DEMOCRACY": Tom, a zombie hunter, follows a zombie into a polling station. He will discover a government conspiracy to use the undead as voters! In story 2 "BAD OFFICE DAY": Father Hildebrand, a tough old school catholic priest, prepares himself for battle and recalls how he tracked down a traitor inside the high command of the Catholic Church and learned of an imminent demonic invasion through a magic portal. Hildebrand has decided to journey into hell and blow up the portal himself. Story 3 is "13&13;": Tom a WWII ace pilot is in the middle of a dogfight over the German countryside, but he's not flying alone. A ghoulish creature sitting on the backseat has foretold Tom his exact hour of death. Tom will stop at nothing to make the creature change its mind?

Letters In the Sand

Temperatures on Earth continue to rise, threatening all life, and humankind must send a team of astronaut scientists in search of a new planet to call home. Imagine you have to choose: live the remainder of your days with the family you love, or give them up for a chance to save them.

A father and son try to live with the consequences in "Letters in the Sand", inspired by the Queen song "39", the seventh story in KILLER QUEEN, A COMIC ANTHOLOGY inspired by the discography of Queen. Story by Dino Caruso; art by Matthew Walters. The PDF also features BONUS ART from Laura Guzzo and R. Robert Pollak!
name: Letters In the Sand

description:
Tragedies & Reflections

With Treves having used his connections to discover that Ferrari has also returned to London, Merrick decides it is finally time to confront his previous tormentor.
name: Tragedies & Reflections

description: Follow the newest addition to the asylum, (Abraham Van Helsing) as he goes deeper into The Monster Home.

The exciting conclusion to The Nain Rouge tale! The Nain Rouge proclaims the penalty to Tom and Elly...they are to die on a certain night. And there's nothing they can do about it. The two teens dejectedly count down the days, knowing they have no chance of escape and that no one will believe their tale. When the night finally comes, The Nain Rouge arrives to exact his revenge... The Nain Rouge is a harbinger of doom that revels in the downfall of humanity and with the recent problems facing the Motor City, there has been numerous sightings of the creature again...

La Cucaracha entran pero no su salir

The villains have united under Vega Bond's banner. Rose City is being terrorized by the new villains alliance. The heroes are doing what they can to stop them but is it too late? Will Rose City fall under Vega Bond's iron grip?
name: La Cucaracha Entran Pero no su Salir

description:
The Second Revolution is about to begin. Can ONE person really save a world ruled by madmen with super humans as their slaves?

This issue - The three meta-humans hunting Kane have found him. Itâ€™s a battle to the end between them and the other survivors who helped Kane last issue as Season 1 comes to an explosive finale.

Bird or Devil

The otherworldly persistence of Corvan Moore has brought him back to Cog Town--and just in time! He must gather his allies together if there's any hope of preventing a cataclysmic war from leaving Cog Town nothing but ashes, rubble, and corpses. Corvan's whole life--including the sacrifice of his family--all led up to this very night: The Night of the Morrigan!
name: Bird or Devil

description:
It's 1232 and Heinrich Barbarossa (known as Thurim on Resurrection) and his crusading knights defeat the Saracen army on The Mountain of God in the Holy Land, leaving him free to seize the Thurim Hammer - with just a small matter of sacrificing his loyal knights in the process, the treacherous infidel!

On Resurrection, at the Field of the Cloth of Crimson, Dracula concludes some Black Opium business with the Dystopians, and Lady Claudia Demona shows off her animal obedience training in a 'friendly' tournament. Down, boy! Down!

...While Requiem, bent on rescuing Rebecca from the Convent of Blood, faces seriously heavy nun action - has he finally met his match against the monstrous Mother Superior?

Requiem 7 continues to wow with stunning painted art, featuring a Hieronymus Bosch-esque vertical spread of Thurim's personal hell, and includes a gallery collection of unlettered artwork from all the volumes released digitally so far.
name: The Convent of The Sisters of Blood

description:
Caged!

Revenger is caged in the bowels of the Hotel Neptune. How will she escape? Will she survive? Will she smash goons with a hammer?!
name: Caged!

person_credits.name: Charles Forsman
person_credits.role: writer, editor, artist, letterer, cover, production

description:
A Changing of the Guard

Rob is hired to find out who is hijacking U.N. fuel supplies in the Balkans and squares off against an Eastern European warlord, while also dealing with the romantic attentions of a former flame now married to a corrupt businessman and a physician involved in humanitarian aid. Globetrotting adventure at its best!
name: A Changing of the Guard

description: As the superhuman Civil War threatens to crush the Runaways, the Young Avengers offer assistance - but how can the Runaways trust that they're on the same side? As the Runaways make hard decisions about their future, they confront a horrific enemy who threatens to tear the team apart! Then, the Skrulls launch their Secret Invasion - and the Runaways and Young Avengers both have a Skrull on their team. Coincidence? With Xavin having betrayed his teammates, and Hulkling out of commission, can the Runaways and Young Avengers survive? And in the aftermath, visionary creator Joss Whedon sends the team running in a whole new direction - first to the East Coast, then a century into the past! Collecting CIVIL WAR: YOUNG AVENGERS AND RUNAWAYS #1-4, RUNAWAYS (2005) #19-30, RUNAWAYS SAGA and SECRET INVASION: RUNAWAYS/YOUNG AVENGERS #1-3.
name: Volume Three

description:
And Now...THE EVIL VISPER!!!

It's here! The exciting conclusion of SAMI the Samurai Squirrel Volume 1! What happened to Sami at the end of issue 3? Is she gone for good?? Will the evil Visper and his Vloop army take over the village??? The answers to these questions and more will be revealed in this action packed 4th issue of SAMI from Aw Yeah Comics and creator Scoot McMahon!
name: And Now...THE EVIL VISPER!!!

description:
Chapter 2

Infected by an alien virus and put into a state of suspended animation, Sinthetic has awakened to a world that is more machine than planet. The year is 2514. The planet is Earth, drained of its resources, its once thriving ecosystem gone. Mankind is forced to survive by the most primitive of means, taking refuge in the massive pipeline system that permeate the planet. Following an encounter with a horrifying cyborg, Sinthetic and Henry must reach the rebel's hideout and warn the others that their sector is about to be overrun by drones. Drawn by the dying drone's "mourning beacon", its brethren turn out by the hundreds. They come not to grieve, but to harvest. In this time of The Enforcer, humanity is the last remaining resource to be exploited, and Henry and Sinthetic, are unintentionally leading his army to the richest mining grounds yet.

After learning of his immortality, things look grimmer than ever for Tim. Locked away, alone, hidden from the other prisoners, certain forces are conspiring to make his life a living hell. Executed, tortured, and abused, Tim must face internal and external demons, and hope that something or someone may help him. The darkness is spreading. Tim must hold on to what light he has.

FRAGILE: Questionable loyalties within the Tin Kin council creates tension among the lower ranks. The search for Pasha comes to an end. And the bloody, violent history of the Tin Kin and Maw tribes begins to be revealed.

Note: The digital edition (3/25/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
While the rest of the team tries to build an army, Greg and Ezra approach a breaking point.
In this issue: The Amazons race to prevent a terrorist attack that will have dire consequences for the entire world.

Everything That Begins to Exist Has a Cause pt. 2

Still unbelieving after witnessing the mysterious events in THEODICY BOOK ONE, doubting priest Father John Augustine reluctantly contacts the Vatican to investigate whether a child in his parish is performing miracles. The Vatican responds by sending in a security team the size of a small army to occupy John's church. But are they there to protect the miracle child, or to exploit him?
name: Everything That Begins to Exist Has a Cause pt. 2

description:
Supernatural bounty hunter John Tower has long been a man shrouded in mystery. Now, discover what set him on this path of horror as his origins are finally uncovered, revealing just what Tower is risking his life to find!

With Tower and Alicia cornered by the Brotherhood of the Rose, they must plot their harrowing escape. Facing imminent peril, Tower reveals his connection to the Brotherhood and the quest that drives him to the darkest places on earth, as his violent past comes back to haunt him. Witness Tower's first battle with a supernatural creature and discover the twisted events that transformed him from a mere mortal into the undying warrior he has become!

Two stories in 32 pages including:

"The Organ-Grinder" pt. 4 â€“ Wanted: Jeremiah McAlester! The Innocents hatch a plan to bring Jeremiah in, and get some transients out of town in the process.

"The Forgetting" pt. 3 â€“ After centuries apart, Luxa returns to America to search for the Forgetter, and reminisces on the last time theyâ€™d met. John and the Forgetter flee the scene of the Forgetterâ€™s resurrection and seek some peculiar help. Inside the mountain tomb, Five-Fingers and the Goddessâ€™ followers perform the rite and prepare for the Goddessâ€™ return.
name: The Organ-Grinder pt. 4; The Forgetting pt. 3

description:
No Rest for the Wicked, Part 2

The Unforgiven brace themselves for the repercussions of the new High Chancellor appointment, but the High Chancellor seems to have more pressing concerns than rebel movement... Meanwhile, another evil seems to have its sights set on The Unforgiven...and its power is growing! Part two of two.
name: No Rest For the Wicked, Part 2

description: All-New story and art! The popular web comic returns to it's original home in comics. Picking up where we left, re-join Alicia, Arnie, Bash, and Chas in a story of Sex, Booze, Rock 'N' Roll and a touch of Magic.

Inside Greyhawk Island

Mr. Sneeze and crew, believing Flemm was eaten by the Sea Monster, continue onto Greyhawk Island where they find an old friend.
name: Inside Greyhawk Island!

description: Yani begins to spiral into a dark place after obsessing over her long gone ex-boyfriend.
name: Book 3

description: Penny is a capable chef who dreams of opening the best restaurant in Seattle. One day, out of the blue, her ex-husband, Cal, asks to meet her. He wants her to help breathe life back into his family's oldest restaurant. He's still as handsome as he was when they separated three years ago, and she never could hate him; so she gives him the okay-as long as he agrees to all of her conditions. Penny's once-smoldering feelings for him light back up, but she can't admit it. After all, she's sure he doesn't love her anymore...
name: Vol. 1

description: They divorced three years ago, but Penny has only just learned her ex-husband Cal's secret: he has a seventeen-year-old daughter! Why did he keep this information hidden all these years? Penny still loves him, but Cal has his own set of worries. He loves Penny, but she found out about his daughter, Lindsey, in the worst way possible. And to make matters worse, Lindsey's serious illness has come back. Determined not to hurt anyone, Cal feels stuck. Who will support him when he needs it most? Will Penny and Cal ever tell each other how they feel?
name: Vol. 2

description:
Tomorrow Never Knows

The 'Hoh'hri' are on their way to earth, Tei'on, the mighty protector of the universe and leader of the 'Noro' has sent an orb containing a power to rival his own down to earth in hopes it will grant powers to a worthy champion. A champion who can hold the Hoh'hri off until the Noro arrive.

Unfortunately, it may have missed its mark...
name: Tomorrow Never Knows

description:
Washington is burning -- but with the effects of AXIS felt across the world, will X-Factor put out the fire...or watch it burn? The team steals the Nuclear Football from a Red Skull-controlled president and takes it back to Serval Industries for protection -- but now, can their corporate headquarters withstand an attack from Sunfire and Longshot? And when Sunfire makes a very odd proposal, how will X-Factor resolve the crisis? Plus: Quicksilver is finally reunited with his estranged daughter, Luna -- but the Inhumans aren't too happy about it! And when the team is dispatched to the Middle East to stop a war, a vengeful Egyptian goddess is set free -- and her first target is X-Factor! Finally, as Spider-Man 2099 swings onto the scene, we finally learn the secret of Serval CEO Harrison Snow!

Collects All-New X-Factor #13-20.
name: Volume 3

description:
Spidey gets by with a little help from his friends! If he can survive a rematch with the Tri-Sentinel, this time without Captain Universe powers, Spider-Man will face a sidekick's revenge! But wait, he never had a sidekick. So who is the Secret Empire's cyborg powerhouse Midnight? To get to the bottom of this mess, the web-slinger will need to do a little old-fashioned teaming up. How's Moon Knight, Punisher, Nova, Night Thrasher and Darkhawk? Not enough names? Well, the extravaganza known as the Vibranium Vendetta has Iron Man, Black Panther, Kingpin and...hoo-boy...the metallic menace known as Ultron! How does Peter Parker handle all this action without Cardiac problems?

Collects Amazing Spider-Man (1963) #351-360, Amazing Spider-Man Annual #25, Spectacular Spider-Man Annual #11, Web of Spider-Man Annual #7.
name: TPB

volume.name: Amazing Spider-Man Epic Collection: Round Robin

description: Issue # 1 of Beautiful, Silly, and Terrible Things focuses on three stand-alone stories, each one a different genre, serving together to showcase not only the new, rising talents, but also the versatility of the medium. Whether it's laughter or a tug at the heart-strings, there's something for anyone and everyone in Beautiful, Silly, and Terrible Things # 1!
The Balloon Boy and his parents move to a new town. But the neighbours don't trust the strange new boy who moved to their neighbourhood.

volume.name: The Boy With A Balloon For A Head

description: In this issue: Luis PÃ©rez de GuzmÃ¡n has a problem. His family's silver mine in New Spain has been attacked by escaped African slaves known as the cimarrÃ³nes. And his oldest ally, the exiled samurai Kitazume, is in a coma.

Horror in Reveshire

Reveshire is invaded by Demons. Kenneth, the Conjuror Apprentice, is ill-prepared, and much is lost.
name: Horror In Reveshire

description:
A mutated cybernetic boar searches for his place in the world. Looking for peace, Cy-boar usually finds only danger, and skull splitting action!

CY-BOAR #1: THE ESCAPE

A boar is shot for eating a farmers crops, but instead of dying, ends up the subject of a sinister government experiment.
name: The Escape

description: Hawkeye, the world's greatest marksman, is reunited with his ex-wife - super-spy Mockingbird! Thought dead for years, Mockingbird is eager to punch some bad guys. But when Clint tags along on her mission, can they ignore their feelings long enough to save the day? Or will old foes Crossfire and the Phantom Rider destroy them first? Plus: When Mockingbird is targeted for death along with Hawkeye's former flame the Black Widow, Hawk and Mock must discover who's killing Marvel's super-spies - and the shock ending will leave Clint blindsided! It's high-octane action and intrigue as Hawkeye and Mockingbird take on the world's biggest threats - and each other! Collecting NEW AVENGERS: THE REUNION #1-4, HAWKEYE & MOCKINGBIRD #1-6, WIDOWMAKER #1-4, HAWKEYE: BLINDSPOT #1-4, HAWKEYE & MOCKINGBIRD SKETCHBOOK, and material from DARK REIGN: NEW NATION #1 and ENTER THE HEROIC AGE #1.
name: TPB

description:
The Man of Stone

A traveler carrying an enigmatic stone monolith arrives at the gates of Bastion from beyond the wall of shadow that surrounds it.
name: Chapter One: The Man of Stone

description:
Welcome to Heroes R Us!

Heroes R Us is the story of a small town turned upside by the transformation of a general store into a toy store that sells superpowers! All the children rush to get their own toys so they can become superheroes! To bring order to the chaos an academy has been created to teach the kids about the proper way to use their abilities for the good of mankind. Created by David Clarke and Illustrated by Joanne Kwan, Welcome to Heroes R Us!
name: Welcome to Heroes R Us!

description:
Iron Man saved Bruce Banner's life, but at a strange price. Who or what is Doc Green, aka the Omega Hulk? And why is he targeting -- and "curing" -- the Hulk's Gamma-powered extended family? Rick Jones is the first to face the sinister Doc, but he might not survive his prescription! Next, Doc Green takes on Skaar -- but when someone else intercedes in the battle, all hell breaks loose! And don't think the Doc has forgotten about the Gamma Corps and Red She-Hulk! But when it comes time for Red Hulk to take his medicine, there'll be mass smashing and widespread destruction! Guest-starring Kitty Pryde and Daredevil! And oh yeah --who shot Bruce Banner to begin with? Plus: Someone close to HULK dies! What impact will this have on one of the most dangerous super beings on the planet?

Collects Hulk (2014) #5-10, Annual #1.
name: Book 1

description:
Thought dead by most of the world since INFINITY, Inhuman king Black Bolt steps back into the spotlight! Black Bolt and Maximus have been secretly involved with the New Avengers' activities for months now, but that's not even close to the whole story of their absence. The Boltagon brothers are in trouble -- and it's going to end very badly for one of them! Meanwhile, Medusa's inversion thanks to the events of AXIS is making her a very different ruler of Attilan! What is the Ennilux Corporation, and how does it factor into the Inhumans' future? Reader and Iso make their return, but they're in horrible danger! Who will rise to fill the throne of Attilan?

Collects Inhuman (2014) #7-11.
name: Volume 2

description:
Presenting a complete collection of Iron Fist's latter-day solo series! It's a cavalcade of kung-fu capers that will transform your bookshelf like unto a thing of iron! Danny Rand faces the Steel Serpent -- but it's more like the "Steal Serpent" when he takes the power of the Iron Fist! Who is Death Sting, what does she want with the Scorpio Key -- and what does she have to do with Danny's sister? When an ancient evil rises, will Danny be Iron Fist no more? If so, he'll need Wolverine's help when Tokyo begins transforming into the mystical city of K'un Lun! Plus: Take a fresh look at the uncanny origin of Iron Fist!

Collects Iron Fist (1996) #1-2, Iron Fist (1998) #1-3, Iron Fist/Wolverine #1-4, Iron Fist (2004) #1-6, Uncanny Origins #14.
name: TPB

volume.name: Iron Fist: The Return of K'un Lun

description:
The Awakening

"Judas Breed - The Awakening" is about a woman named Connie Beaumont and her team of NASA scientists who embark on an expedition to an unknown planet in hopes of proving that life once existed there. While searching through one of the caves for micro organisms, Connie falls through a huge hole and finds herself standing in what appears to be a tomb, filled with alien skeletal remains. As the team examines one of the skeletons, Connie finds a fossilized alien anthropod attached to the vertebrae of the skeleton and decides to take it back to the ship. The fossil comes to life, attacks one of the crew members and attaches itself to the victim's vertebrae. The government finds out and keeps the victim and anthropod for themselves to do studies. While conducting more studies on earth, the victim is transformed into an alien and all hell breaks loose, as aliens threaten the lives of humanity. Connie and a handful of Marines are forced to go into combat, as they search for the aliens nest to destroy it. This story is about family, government conspiracy, betrayal and the hopes of saving humanity from an alien outbreak.
name: The Awakening

description:
Ged and Jae are brothers. Being the older brother Ged likes to pass on things he has learned to his little brother. Jae has a rough start in Kindergarten trying to understand why a kid named Billy bullies him.

Can Ged help Jae?
name: What Makes A Bully?

volume.name: Live and Learn With Ged & Jae

description:
Featuring screen-capture images from MARVEL'S ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN: WEB WARRIORS It's the start of an all-new era of adventure based on the smash hit DISNEY XD animated series as Spider-Man teams up with the Marvel Universe's greatest heroes!

Spidey joins Captain America in a raid on Dr. Doom's fortress to retrieve Cap's lost shield!

Hawkeye the Avenger joins Spidey to swat the villainous Beetle in a super-hero bug hunt!

Spider-Man and Iron Man join forces when a lab experiment at Stark Industries goes horribly wrong, putting the entire city in danger! Collecting MARVEL UNIVERSE ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN: WEB WARRIORS #1-4.
name: Volume 1

description: From the pages of the best-selling comic book series "the 10th Muse", comes this spin-off series. Morgan Wulf has been given a second chance at life...as a 17-year-old girl! With the awesome powers of The Muse, she can fearlessly face off against Greek goddesses & mythological monsters. But as Morgan, she must confront the most frightening challenge of all: HIGH SCHOOL! Including all the The Muse issues, Odyssey, Atlas, and God War!
name: TPB

description: Based on Compass Point: Westâ„¢, a visually stunning 3D action strategy game from Next Games set in the Wild West, IDW Publishing presents Compass Point: West #0, a free digital comic containing two rootin' tootin' and six-gun shootin' tales that introduce the game's rich story, fun line of characters, and colorful world! Written by Tom Waltz (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles) with art by exciting newcomer Philip Murphy!

Kate happens to walk in on her boyfriend, Steven, who she was thinking about marrying, in bed with another woman. Brokenhearted, she runs to her childhood friend Nick, who she has known for twenty years. He is now a playboy running an IT company; but he understands her feelings the most because they grew up together. A month after he's comforted her just like in the old days, Kate realizes that she can't avoid running into Steven at her best friend's wedding, so Nick offers to act as her boyfriend at the event!
name: Vol. 1

description:
In the Dream World, power and adventure belong to the Lucid Dreamers, while Night Terrors haunt the troubled and the helpless. A lucky few are watched over by mysterious guardians. The protectors of our shared unconscious lives are known as...

...Dream Walkers.

Latchkey brothers Jonas and Alan Anderson have discovered a Universe beyond our own, one that can only be reached through dreams. A tangible world filled with fantastic and frightening things, accessible only to those lucky few with the ability to lucid dream. There, they will find not only mind-blowing adventure, but the key to a vast secret history and their role in the protection of The Waking World.

Conceived and written by Multi-platinum recording artist Tom DeLonge (Blink182, Angels and Airwaves) and Ben Kull (Father of the Pride, Mission Hill), and illustrated by animation sensation Djet, this original comic series reveals an epic, ageless race for Immortality, Power, and Purpose.

The comic book prequel to the award-winning animated short film!

Note: The digital edition (3/25/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.

Charles Band's long-running cult classic horror film series makes its way to the comic page! When a group of friends sets out to use the abandoned Bodega Bay Inn as a party spot, they find out first-hand that the bizarre local folklore is more truth than fantasy as an army of twisted autonomous Puppets have their way with the trespassing teens! The Puppets are back, and they're out for blood!

List of covers and their creators:

Note: The digital edition (3/25/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: The Offering Part 1

description:
Are You YOU On The SAFE LIST?

In the very near future, the sadistic founders of a sinister secret society are turning their members into flesh-ripping drones ready to carry out horrific methods of "population control." They are the men and women of R.E.E.P.E.R., and it will take the Chicago PD's finest to solve the mystery and hunt them down before their city is eaten alive-literally.

The R.E.E.P.E.R. Men have put all citizens on either the SAFE LIST or the EXPUNGE LIST. Which list you're on is up to this maniac organization and their Laws of R.E.E.P.E.R. With their identical, reinforced suits, horrifying cyborg skull masks, and lust for a bloody feast, they're a danger to everyone they deem worthy of being expunged.

Are you on the SAFE LIST?
name: Are You YOU On The SAFE LIST?

description: Archie and the gang have had it with Reggieâ€™s pranks! Itâ€™s time to get even! This year, Reggie is the April fool with this digital exclusive collection. How will the gang get him? After all, they say you canâ€™t trick a trickster! Maybe this wonâ€™t be as easy as they had hopedâ€¦
Meet David Bloch, an ordinary man about to embark on a journey he could never have imagined.

This adaptation of the tales of Robin Hood blends various stories and anecdotes into a single narrative, spanning the life and death of Robin Hood.

From the back cover: Courage, cunning, leadership... and unparalleled skill with a bow! With King Richard held hostage across the sea, his brother, Prince John, has set about a plan to increase his riches and make his temporary rise to the crown... permanent. Under John's rule, local authorities like the Sheriff of Nottingham and Sir Guy of Gisbourne oversee a scheme that is taxing the people beyond their tolerance.

Beset by tragedy, young Robin of Locksley flees into Sherwood Forest and emerges as Robin Hood, leader of the Merry Men - a band of outlaws who fight the Sheriff's policies by robbing his money wagons and distributing the proceeds to their poor countrymen.

Robin Hood, along with Maid Marion, Little John, Friar Tuck, and others, battles to outwit Prince John, the Sheriff, and Sir Guy, and restore the balance of power between the sovereign and his subjects.

Collects The Sadhu: Wheel of Destiny #1-4:

Following the events in the SILENT ONES, James Jensen is at a crossroads in history. India has gained a new freedom movement. Proponents of armed revolution stand on one side, while messiah Mahatma Gandhi preaches non-violence on the other. As the British Empire fights for control of India, the Sadhu is locked in the middle, where his actions can sway fate.
name: Volume 3

description:
As Coulson's investigation takes him to Peru, Black Widow, Spider-Woman and Hawkeye go after Lady Bullseye and Artaud Derrida. The noose tightens as Maria Hill puts the pieces together, and the Secret Avengers find themselves hunted! What does S.H.I.E.L.D. want with the Fury? What is Tlon? M.O.D.O.K. explains it all -- including his own amazing origin! And as Hawkeye and Deadpool team up, secrets come to light -- and they might cost Black Widow her life! The true mastermind of the decay at the center of the Secret Avengers initiative is revealed, and the clues trace back to the start of it all! Hawkeye and Coulson face off, Vladimir makes a deal with the Fury, and the Helicarrier comes under attack! But with Maria Hill gone, what happens to the rest of the team?

Collects Secret Avengers (2014) #6-10.
name: Volume 2

description: Daniel is a civil servant for the Department of Pediatric Spirituality. He hunts the ghosts that prey on children. But now things have changed...
name: Vol. 1

description: Collecting the acclaimed weekly neo-noir starring Sam Kimimura, who Greg Rucka declared "...can trace his line back to Philip Marlowe and Lew Archer and stand with the best of them!" Sam's followed a girl who doesn't want to be found to a town that wants to say off the map; what he discovers while there pushes him to his limits. Find out why Blair Butler declared that SHE DIED IN TERREBONNE "...reads like a lost Ross McDonald novel" and Comics Alliance named it one of the 8 Best Noir Comics.

volume.name: She Died In Terrebonne: A Sam Kimimura Mystery

description:
She-Hulk, Hellcat and Giant-Man team up to save one of Jen's officemates -- but what secret agenda does Hank Pym have? Meanwhile, She-Hulk takes on Captain America as her newest client! Someone from Cap's past has returned to haunt them all, and She-Hulk might be his only hope -- because the opposing attorney is Matt Murdock! She-Hulk and Daredevil battle it out in court and on the streets in this trial of the century -- but is Captain America actually guilty after all? And at long last, it's all come down to this: the Blue File revealed! As Hellcat investigates the mysterious, mind-altering file, She-Hulk takes on Titania -- and Angie Huang just might meet her fate! Secrets are revealed and the Blue File is opened wide as Charles Soule and Javier Pulido's acclaimed run comes to a close!

Collects She-Hulk (2014) #7-12.
name: Volume 2

description:
Dive into the world of Devi with this free sampler comic!

Created by acclaimed filmmaker Shekhar Kapur (Elizabeth, Four Feathers, Bandit Queen).

Tara Mehta, an unsuspecting young woman in the futuristic Asian city, Sitapur is the Devi. She has no idea that she is about to become the centerpiece of a divine battle between the Gods of Light and the demon Lord Bala. Devi is a powerhouse of a story about a young woman battling for survival in a landscape of ancient legends, duty and fate. She walks the line between tradition, destiny and free will. Where will she fall? Between the Divine and the Diabolical there is Devi.

Welcome to Entropy Island

David is excited to join his father for a meeting on a fantastic island full of colorful characters. Little does the innocent six-year-old understand the dangers surrounding he and his caretaker robot, Sam, as they come to be among hundreds of infamous villains on a island full of the most deadly technology in the world.
name: Welcome to Entropy Island

description: I may be just a shy, boring person, but I'll reinvent myself on this cruise! Lana Walker holds this thought firmly in mind as she boards the ship that will take her all around the South Pacific. However, just as she clears the gangplank in her usual plain navy business suit, she trips! "Watch out!" Zac, a sailor clad in a dazzlingly white uniform with eyes a deeper blue than the ocean itself, catches her. Lana's face glows hot from his teasing smile. "What's going on with me?" But just when she's almost taken in by his charm, she overhears him: "Women are all as vicious as piranhas."
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: Two Weeks in the Magnate's Bed

description:
Everything has been leading to this: a turning point for the Uncanny X-Men! And it all revolves around their deceased former mentor and leader, Professor Charles Xavier! Scott Summers has swiftly become one of the world's most wanted men. Thanks to the Phoenix-possessed murder of Professor X, he destroyed his former life and must now remain constantly vigilant in case of attack. But is the greatest threat to his safety lurking within the dark recesses of his own mind? Then, Magneto returns to the X-Men, but they're certainly not happy to see him. In the fallout from AXIS, the team returns to the school to lick their wounds and search for an identity. Are they terrorists, revolutionaries, teachers or something else entirely? For some, the events of AXIS may have left a deeper wound than anyone realizes.

Collects Uncanny X-Men (2013) #26-31.
name: Volume 5

description:
When Jakob, VÃ¶gelein's Guardian of fifty years, dies quietly in his sleep one night, her life is thrown into utter turmoil. Left without someone to wind her, the tiny clockwork faerie has less than five hours to live -- unless she can find someone to trust. Unable to reach the keyhole in her back, she continues to wind down until she stops -- and then her memories of the past three hundred years will quickly slip away, leaving her as a simple automaton unable to speak or move on her own.

In her search for a new Guardian, VÃ¶gelein must grapple with her own past, her current daily survival and a true Faerie who has taken an instant disliking to her, all so she will not lose her memories -- and her self.
name: Clockwork Faerie

description:
Imperialist controlled Hong Kong, the British ruling classes and the ambitious dynasty-influenced Chinese all create an amazing labyrinth for His Dream of the Skyland, book one in The Walled City trilogy.

The Chinese-colonial inspired illustrations create an utterly distinct experience, immersing you in a world that is opulent, dark and absorbing.
name: His Dream of the Skyland

description: Bewitching green eyes and a stunning body dressed to seduce... Photographer Luke St. Clair can't forget the woman who'd boldly picked him up at a party. He'd woken the next morning to find her gone; she didn't even tell him her name. A year and a half later, a stroke of luck leads him to discover her identity: Rachel Manning. She is a model...and married! Determined to uncover her true motive behind their night of passion, Luke decides to book her for a photo shoot?
name: Vol. 1
